title: Web Apps & APIs
description: I develop both front-end & back-end of websites using Express.js, React.js, Python Flask/Django, Node.js and Go-lang

title: Machine Learning
description: With knowledge in AI & Machine learning, I create effective models for complex business challenges using Tensorflow/Keras & Scikit-learn.

title: Mobile Development
description: I build cross-platform mobile apps using React Native & Flutter, delivering seamless user experiences on both iOS and Android.

title: UI/UX
description: I design user-centered digital experiences emphasizing functionality, usability, and aesthetics, ensuring user-friendly products.

title: DevOps
description: I use CI/CD practices to automate deployment and testing processes, ensuring robust and stable releases, while leveraging Docker & Kubernetes for scalability.
